home.register: Don't have an account? Sign up here.
home.language: The language has been changed to English
home.msg1: Welcome to the knowledge challenge! Get ready to test your mind and demonstrate your skills. In this exciting game, you will face a series of questions that will test your knowledge on a variety of topics.
home.msg2: So go ahead, prove that you are the master of questions! Are you ready to accept the challenge?

instructions.title: WIQ Instructions
instructions.objective_p1: The objective of the game is to answer as many questions correctly as possible.
instructions.how_to_play_p1: The game consists of a series of questions.
instructions.how_to_play_p3: Choose the correct answer from the options provided.
instructions.how_to_play_p4: Click or tap on your selected answer to submit it.
instructions.scoring_p1: Each correct answer earns you x points.
instructions.scoring_p2: Incorrect answers do not deduct points.
instructions.time_limit_p1: Some game modes may have a time limit for answering each question. Be quick and accurate to maximize your score.
instructions.have_fun_p1: Enjoy the game and test your knowledge. Good luck!

login.title: Login
login.forget_pass: Have you forgotten your password? Let's restore it.
login.register_link: Don't you have an account? Register here.

addUser.title: Register
addUser.login_link: Do you have an account? Login here.
addUser.error_password_minimum_length: Password must be at least 8 characters long
addUser.error_password_maximum_length: Password cannot be over 64 characters long

gameConfigurator.rules_competi: Play with all kinds of questions and a quantity of 5

error.sorry: We're sorry, this page does not exist. Don't be angry, I'm just a little cat.

forgotPassword.sending_paragraph: In order to restore your password we are sending an email with a code of 6 digits
forgotPassword.enter_code: Enter code of 6 digits that was sent via email
